span.font: Now Broadcasting - On The Air Live!

br.div:
Now On Air:
Allie Cheslick -- "Wings of Love Radio" --- More
Up Next Hour:
Allie Cheslick -- "Wings of Love Radio" --- More

Achieve Radio was the First Internet Talk Radio Station devoted to Self Improvement, Holistic Health, Spiritual and Psychic Radio Programming. Our program line-up offers "News You Can Use" and interviews with experts in just about any topic imaginable. We offer Angel Readings, Psychic Readings and Medium Readings from some of the top Psychics and readers in the field. We are your best choice for psychic talk radio listening. Learn from the top teachers in the spiritual field. Get breaking alternative and holistic health news from the people who are making the news. With our 24/7 live streams and thousands of hours of archived talk radio shows and podcasts, available instantly worldwide, Achieve Radio is also a technology leader in internet radio broadcasting. Now 8 years young, Achieve Radio is what talk radio Should Be. Get Empowered!

br.span:
On each show we discuss the weekly aspects of the Sun, Moon, Mercury and other outer planets. We give Astrology Mini-Readings to our listeners and discuss upcoming Eclipses, Mercury Retrogrades and other celestial phenomena.We continue to have guest astrologers on the show throughout the year such as Michele Adler, Marguerite Manning, Debra Clement and Leah Mueller.
On Today: Wednesday June 6th, 2012
YOUR ASTROLOGY NOW
Join us for a fun and exciting hour all about astrology. Our Guest, Lucy Pond from Portland, OR will discuss the latest lunar eclipse and the "Transit of Venus." She and Brenda will look at your charts and tell you how this week's planetary activity
Lucy Pond is an Astrologer and Tarot Reader with over 35 years of experience. She is a professional reader, writer and teacher of metaphysics. Lucy and her brother, David Pond, published a book called "The Metaphysical Handbook" which has sold over 20,000 copies. Clients consult Lucy about the things that concern them the most: relationships, family, financial issues, career and business concerns. You may contact Lucy to arrange for a reading at lucypond@comcast.net. Her website is www.lucypond.com.
http://www.lucypond.com
http://www.astrologyforbabyboomers.com

a.span: More about Brenda and Lauren & Archived Shows - Click Here

br.span:
Authentic Master Tarot practitioner, Ann Marie gives flowing Certified Psychic Phone Readings. Ann Marie offers warm kitchen table Intuitive Advice with 37 years Angel Reading experience. You will find her as Annie O’Dell in the Psychic Directory as well as Keen, where she has over 15,000 client feedbacks as “Sister Othelia.” Get honest illuminating clarity on romance, career, life strategy or spiritual unrest.
On Today: Wednesday June 6th, 2012
Eric Linter * International Astrology Consultant joins Ann Marie for 2 Live Readings per call!
Eric Linter, international astrology consultant, is filled with the fresh positive energy of Good Morning America! His consulting practice is based in Norfolk, MA.
After earning a BFA at Boston University, Eric Linter studied astrology and the esoteric arts with the renowned Grande Dame of American astrologers, Isabel M. Hickey. Eric later received certification as a Holistic Health Counselor from Heartwood College in Santa Cruz, CA where he attended classes with astrologer Robert Cole.
A gifted intuitive, teacher and speaker, Eric has both led and produced a wide range of transformational seminars. Also a trained rebirther and past-life regression therapist, he applied his artistic talent and knowledge of the occult to co-create The Miracle Cards, a New Age Tarot. Today Eric lives in eastern Massachusetts with his wife and two dogs.

a.span: More about Ann Marie & Archived Shows - Click Here

span.br:
Walking with Spirit, America’s premier metaphysical and personal growth talk show stars Monique Chapman.
Monique is an internationally acclaimed Intuitive Transformation Consultant with over 25 years experience assisting people to get their lives back on track. Intuitive since birth, Monique has a unique way to tap into your past, present and future to assist you along life’s path. Folks say, if you really don’t want to know don’t ask Monique. She will tell you the straight truth!
Monique also brings you the authors, movers and shakers that will keep you informed and entertained. From the mundane to the mystical - and beyond - Monique's insightful and probing interview style is talk radio at it's best.
On Today: Wednesday June 6th, 2012
<Hour 1
Robin Marvel
Hour 2
Billee Sharp
Hour1
Robin Marvel author of ‘Reshaping Reality Crating Your Life’ shares with us how we can stop existing and start L-I-V-I-N-G. Tune in to learn how reshaping your inner child can change your life and how to break the patterns of self
Hour 2
Billee Sharp
Detox your budget , home an food. ‘Lemons and Lavender The Eco Guide to Better Homekeeping’, author Billee Sharp has assembled an inspiring and instructive guide to living the handmade life by consuming less and creating more. Jam packed with useful information that is not “on the fringe “ enabling us to change our lives to a greener and less expensive way of being. Learn to cook healthy for pennies on the dollar, cure maladies from the kitchen cabinet and eco clean your house with lemons and lavender. Talking your questions and giving away her book.
http://www.robinmarvel.com

a.span: More About Monique Chapman - Click Here

p.span:
Allie's reputation and comedic personality have earned her a loyal following of clients, referrals and a large local and international radio fan base. Her compassion, ethics, integrity and humor give her the ability to make people feel as though she is a part of their family, a friend and someone who they can trust.
On Today: Wednesday June 6th, 2012
JOHN FORTUNA ~ "The World's Most Honest Psychic" and Author
John Fortuna began giving card readings at the age of 6 using a Tarot deck he found in his home…
Paranormal experiences were common occurrences and he came to accept that the other world is closer to us than we ever imagined.
A few years later he suffered an accident in which he was unconscious for a matter of minutes. During that time a woman in white appeared to him and said
“now that you know the truth… you cannot ever live your life the same again…”
John specializes in bringing that truth to you.
John’s unique perspective is enhanced not only by his spiritual beliefs, but with professional experience as a family counselor, a natural health practitioner, and an artist.
Through the choices we make with our free will, we set in motion a pattern of events. It is up to you to follow that path through to the end or make a change and break the cycle. John is now the host of the "That's what he said…", a show dedicated to helping the masses with their life questions from a male's perspective. His honest answers, sharp wit, and accurate readings will amaze his fans week after week. If you are ready to hear the truth about your path, book your reading with John Fortuna now.
http://www.AdvisorAndReader.com

span.a: More about Allie & Archived Shows - Click Here

td.span:
1pm PT - 2pm MT - 4pm ET
A Closer Look

span.br: A Closer Look has been on radio for over 10 years. Hosted by award-winning journalist Pam Atherton, this multi-faceted interview program has welcomed guests ranging from Willie Nelson and Cher to Senator Ted Kennedy and former Secretary of State Madeleine Albright.

p.span: With an eye toward solutions and empowerment… and with warmth, wit and a comfortable style… Pam brings out the best in her guests. Whether it’s Gerry Spence talking about how he almost became the lead attorney for OJ Simpson, or Willie Nelson on how he quit the radio business, Pam gets the backstory on her guests and the front story that most interviewers miss.

span.a: More About Pam Atherton - Click Here

br.span: The Council of Twelve - Live from the UK

span.br: Join Denis Norman Barnes and the Council of Twelve along with the Galactic Seven for live Channelling and soul Readings / Messages from the Masters. A group of Ascended Masters and Heavenly Host who are here at this time to assist us all in our spiritual growth and journey.

p.span: These masters, as all spiritual masters throughout the universe are working with the Earth and Humanity as time draws close for us to ascend from the third to the fifth dimensional, to some degree their work on this earth plane is to awaken mankind to their true divinity of who we really are and where we come from and where we are going.(shift in consciousnes)

span.a: More About Denis & the Council of Twelve - Click Here

span.font:
pm PT - 4pm MT - 6pm ET
Psychic Fred's Visionary Awareness

with "Psychic Fred" Fassett & Lauren the Astrologer
AN ALL READING SHOW!

font.span: Callers Will Meet Their Spirit Guides…..Obtain Psychic Readings……Receive Guidance and Information from the Spirit World….Past Life Information…..Learn Their Karmic Lessons….. Understand the Paranormal
Born with extensive psychic gifts, Fred Fassett is able to detect paranormal influences around individuals and provide them with the insight and tools to move them through life’s many challenges.

br.a: More About Visionary Awareness - Click Here

p.span:
5pm PT - 6pm MT - 8pm ET
Outside The Box

span.br: “Outside the Box” is a show hosted by Rev. Nancy Zilversmit. The format will be of a different subject matter weekly that is chosen by Spirit along with stories about the daily adventures of interaction with Spirit by both Rev. Nancy and her guests. Listeners may call in or in-quick while stories are being shared and talk about their experiences, ask questions pertaining to the subject matter or request healing.

p.span:
What's REALLY Happening in the World Today?
What's REALLY going on with the World Economy?
How Can YOU Prepare for the Future?
This Show will Inform You.

span.br: in credit card debt. Call-In and he can help you too!

Mr. Martinez discovered that the ability to question the existing establishment on the nature of banking as well as challenging the credit card companies through consumer protection practices had to be done. Mr. Martinez successfully participated in eliminating over $700 million dollars of alleged credit card debt over a ten-year period. James managed to connect with people at The World Bank. International Monetary Fund and Bank of Warburg. This alliance with the help of the public has made this topic the number one concern of America today.

p.span:
6pm PT, 9pm ET
The Law of Distraction & Interruption

The age of technology has increased our knowledge gain power, but it has also increased our interruptions, Do you find yourself being continuously distracted …by the cell phone …appointment calendar …computer pop-ups …flyers stuck to your front door …neighbor’s dog barking …kids screaming and on and on?

On Today: Saturday June 9th, 2012
This ain't Marginal

td.span: Joe's guests: Shaeri Richards, Author, Speaker, Hypnotherapist, Filmmaker and Musician and Sue Larkin, Author of Marginal

a.br: More About the Law of Distraction & Joe - Click Here

br.span:
Guy Finley's
You Can Be Unstoppable

The encouraging and accessible message of Guy Finley is one of the great bright lights in the world today. His concepts delve straight to the heart of our most urgent personal and social issues ­ relationships, fear, addiction, stress/anxiety, peace, happiness, freedom ­ and point the way to a higher life.
Guy is a best-selling author of more than 30 books and audio albums, including The Secret of Letting Go, which have sold more than a million copies. In addition, he has presented over a thousand unique self-realization seminars to thousands of grateful individuals in North America and Europe.
Whatever your place in life and whatever problems you face, Guy Finley's messages will help you achieve the balance you need. You can be Unstoppable!

span.a: More About Guy Finley - Click Here

br.span:
Conceive, Believe Achieve is a radio program that is about building your self-esteem by recognizing the power within in you now. If you can conceive something and believe in that conception then it is possible for you to achieve it. We are what we want to be at this very second it’s just a choice that we need to make.
A master mathematician AND introspective philosopher, Yale will take you on unforgettable journeys into the mystical recesses of your own mind. His Renaissance man grasp of all aspects of the human experience are a delight to anyone remotely interested in life's mysteries.

br.a: More About Yale Devereau - Click Here

p.span: The views and opinions expressed on all radio shows broadcast on Achieve Radio are entirely those of the hosts, guests and callers, who are entirely responsible for all show content, and do not in any way reflect the opinions of Achieve Radio or its staff. These broadcasts are presented and made public AS ENTERTAINMENT, in the hope that they will be entertaining to listeners. They are not intended to diagnose, treat or mitigate in any way any disease or condition or to promote any specific lifestyle, belief, religion, political affiliation or other personal practice, nor is the information presented necessarily accurate or verifiable. Psychic radio and readings are, by their nature, inexact and talk radio of any kind should not be used as a primary source of information.
